revisions.rev:
{{for|the school district and high school in [[Lakewood, Washington]]|Clover Park School District|Clover Park High School}} {{Infobox New Zealand suburbs | name = Clover Park | image = | caption1 = | city1 = [[Auckland Council]] | city2 = | ward = Manukau | established = | area = | population = | popdate = | trainstations = | ferryterminals = | airports = | hospitals = | north = [[Otara]], [[Flat Bush]] | northeast = [[Flat Bush]] | east = [[Chapel Downs]], [[Manukau Heights]] | southeast = [[Goodwood Heights]], [[Totara Heights]] | south = [[Hill Park]], [[Manurewa East]] | southwest = [[Wiri]] | west = [[Manukau City|Manukau Central]] | northwest = [[Papatoetoe]] | map = | caption2 = }} '''Clover Park''' is the name of an [[Auckland]] suburb, located in [[Auckland]], [[New Zealand]]. The area is under governance of the [[Auckland Council]], and is located in the Manukau ward, one of the thirteen administrative divisions of Auckland city.
==Education== There are two schools within Clover Park: *Redoubt North School is a full primary (years 1-8) school with a decile rating of 2 and a roll of 730.<ref>[http://www.tki.org.nz/e/schools/display_school_info.php?school_id=1460 TKI]. Ministry of Education. Retrieved 2009-08-05</ref> *Clover Park Middle School is a restricted composite school (years 7-10) with a decile rating of 1 and a roll of 145.<ref>[http://www.tki.org.nz/e/schools/display_school_info.php?school_id=1250 TKI].Ministry of Education. Retrieved 2009-08-05</ref>
All of these schools are co-educational.
